body:
Hey all,

It's recently come to my attention that a new glitch (or April Fools Prank) has now plagued Minecraft.

"Failed to connect to the server: Failed to login: The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request."

Not sure what this is, it prevents players from connecting to all servers. So, don't leave if you're on a Minecraft server, or you can't get back in. I'll update this post again when this is fixed :3

http://xpaw.ru/mcstatus/
body_tagged:

title: Glitch for some users

replies.body: Haha, we are fooled Mojang. GIVE US BACK OUR SERVERS!
replies.body_tagged: Haha, we are fooled Mojang. GIVE US BACK OUR SERVERS!

replies.body: they can take our girlfriends, they can mold us into nerds, they can waste our lives but we shall not let them take our servers down. Charge for Bob -FlameyCode 2016

replies.body: We're down to the final 33 on avicus.
replies.body_tagged: We're down to the final 33 on avicus.

replies.body: Turns out it isn't april fools, and its a glitch, Mojang are fixing it now!
replies.body_tagged: Turns out it isn't april fools, and its a glitch, Mojang are fixing it now!

replies.body:
It's not a prank.

As you can see, the internal servers are down. Meaning that it's a problem on Mojang's side.

The servers are expected to be down for approximately 40 minutes.

So in an hour or so, everything will be fine.
replies.body_tagged:
It's not a prank.

As you can see, the internal servers are down. Meaning that it's a problem on Mojang's side.

The servers are expected to be down for approximately 40 minutes.

So in an hour or so, everything will be fine.

And the downside is that I'm a Steve.
